tryBoolean.description: best effort attempt to convert the provided Tuple to a boolean.

tryDouble.description: try to convert the provided Tuple to double.

tryIp.description: check that the provided Tuple is an IP value.

tryIpv4.description: check that the provided Tuple is an IP value.

tryIpv6.description: check that the provided Tuple is an IP value.

tryLong.description:
try to convert the provided Tuple to a long. 
It has no effect if the conversion is not possible.

tryEpochMs.description: try to convert the provided Tuple to an epoch timestamp in millisecond. This function accomodates input most date formats. It has no effect if the conversion is not possible.

tryIsoDate.description: try to convert the provided Tuple to iso date format. This function accomodates most input date formats. It has no effect if the conversion is not possible.
